title: looking for any ranked team that plays regulary.
body: i was a gold 5 last year who didn't play much ranked. atm im only bronze 1 but that dosent represent my skill.. looking for any ranked team that plays regulary and are nice people.send me a friend request on league or comment below and ill join your team .. thanks

replies.body: feel free to add me too Beetletank
Sure i added u if u  join ull be the first one im trying to find a team so i went whatever ill just make one
